page.title: 06CHILDREN IN DUFTON
page.content: This information was provided by 2 village children aged 8 & 10 years.5 girls & 2 boys between the ages of 4 & 11 go to Long Marton School on the school bus which leaves the Post Office at 8.50am.If it is raining they wait inside the Post Office.They return at 3.55pm.There is an extensive village green where they play or ride their bikes.They also play in the back lane which leads to the garages and enjoy playing hide and seek.They all go to the Youth Club in the Village Hall where they can roller skate or bounce on a large inflatable.On Wednesdays some of the children go to a childrens' group in Long Marton run by the Vicar. There are many places for walks with children like Dufton Ghyll-a wooded valley where wild flowers & tadpoles may be found.
